name: Hot Sauce Giftpak
Fresh Fruit Curd Trio
description: Lemon Curd, Lime Curd & Orange Curd.  Beautiful custard-like jams purfect for teatime, breakfast time or holiday gift.  Handmade with all natural ingredients, no preservatives.  Just like granny used to make.

name: Salsa Verde (Green Salsa)
description: Mama’s special green salsa.  Add instant flavor to anything you cook and eat.  We can’t live without it!  All natural ingredients, all vegetarian, no preservatives, no oils or fats, no sugars of any kind…handmade in very small batches.

name: Salsa Verde (Green Salsa) - CASE (12 jars)
description: A case of our special salsa verde (12/12oz. jars) Great for holiday gift giving…put one in everyone’s stocking!  Mix half Hot & Mild or all Hot  or all Mild.  Some like it hot and some like it mild.

name: XXXDANGER Habanero Hot Sauce
description: FOR THE HOT MAMA OR HOT DADA IN YOU!!! When it can’t get hot enough only habaneros can do the trick! All natural, not an extract made from fresh red habaneros and flavored with our own sofrito salsa verde. VERY FLAVORFUL HOT SAUCE!
